Reviews.Title: a terrific camera!!
Reviews.Author: Bodythyme
Reviews.Content: I hesitated buying but happily I did and was pleased not only with the camera  which is AWESOME!) but with all the other lens' and gear that came with it in the kit. I have already entered a photo in a contest. It was delivered when they said and again I was pleased. Yes! I will order from them again and Yes! I will buy more Canon products.

Reviews.Title: Cannon T3i SLR Kit
Reviews.Author: Retired nurse in NC
Reviews.Content: I ordered from Sunset Electronics on Amazon.  Received Canon Kit in 4 business days.  Ordered late evening 8/28/11 and received 9/1/11.  Thank you so much for the quick service and no shipping fees.  The box of numerous "camera buff" goodies came intact and packaged securely.  I would purchase from this distribution center again. A big thank you to the whole staff at Sunset Electonics for such great service. The Canon T3i,SLR camera and lens are functioning well! I have much to learn, new to SLR equipment. (From the manual 35mm era.) Instruction CD and book easy to understand.

Reviews.Title: Best of price , products & services.
Reviews.Author: Fred D.
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time. The Camera Canon T3i in conjunction with Tamron lenses work great. Pictures are clear. The packaged price & services was great! Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2) for shooting at high or low angles
3.7 fps continuous shooting up to approximately 34 JPEGs or approximately 6 RAW.
Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards.
Compatible with the full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i SLR Digital Camera Kit with Sigma 18-200mm f/3.5-6.3 II DC OS HSM Lens + Huge SSE Lens Accessory Package
